mapper.select: SELECT m.id mem_id, m.`name` AS mem_name, c.id AS card_id, c.cover_pic, c.color_code, c.`name` card_name, me.id AS merchant_id, me.`name` mer_name, me.head_img, mc.id AS mem_card_id, mc.card_number FROM v_member m LEFT JOIN v_merchant me ON m.merchant_id = me.id LEFT JOIN v_member_card mc ON mc.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN v_card c ON c.id = mc.card_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND m.`status` = 1 AND mc.`status` = 1 AND c.`status` = 1 AND mc.is_default = 1 AND m.id = #{memberId};

SELECT c.id as cardId, c.`name`, c.description, mc.card_number AS cardNumber FROM v_member_card mc LEFT JOIN v_card c ON mc.card_id = c.id LEFT JOIN v_member m ON m.id = mc.member_id WHERE c.`status` = 1 AND mc.`status` = 1 AND m.`status` = 1 AND m.id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE v_member_card SET is_default = 0 where member_id = #{memberId} AND card_id != #{cardId}
